name: Harry Potter Butterbeer
description: Butterbeer at The Wizarding World of Harry Potter at Universal Studious in Hollywood or Orlando
directions: In large mixing bowl, whip heavy cream until it forms stiff peaks.
Add butterscotch topping and powdered sugar.
Mix the caramel and butter extracts with the cream soda and then pour the mixture into clear cups or mugs.
Top with butterscotch cream topping and enjoy!
